entry.title: Mixology Experience Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty
Type: Perfume
Price: 899.00

Discover the art of fragrance layering with our Mixology Experience Kit, a curated set of 8 Extrait De Parfum bottles crafted in France. Create your own scent mood with this super-giftable and travel-friendly fragrance book! This mini perfume set allows you to mix, match, experiment and personalize your own unique scent before committing to a full-sized bottle.

  • 1 x 3ml Vanilla Whispers AM  - Vanilla AM embodies modern elegance with creamy vanilla, delicate jasmine, and lavender. Fresh top notes greet the morning, while a warm, velvety base lingers in effortless luxury. Feminine, refined, and timeless.

  • 1 x 3ml Vanilla Whispers PM - Vanilla PM is a bold, sweet indulgence with caramel, amber, and sandalwood, enriched by exotic florals and musk. Sensual and mysterious, it’s perfect for glamorous evenings and unforgettable nights.

  • 1 x 3ml Amber Elixir AM  - Amber AM is a sophisticated blend of amber, saffron, and brown sugar, balanced with jasmine and cedarwood. Warm and elegant, it leaves a luxurious trail of quiet strength and refinement.

  • 1 x 3ml Amber Elixir PM - Amber PM is a bold fusion of pink pepper, saffron, and smoky leather, softened by caramel, vanilla, and amber. Seductive and rebellious, it’s for the woman who commands attention effortlessly.

  • 1 x 3ml Cafe Noir AM - Coffee AM is a cozy blend of fresh coffee, creamy milk, and cinnamon, evoking a quiet morning’s warmth. Subtle yet profound, it’s perfect for those who cherish life’s simple pleasures.

  • 1 x 3ml Cafe Noir PM - Coffee PM is a bold night scent with rich coffee, spicy cardamom, and chili, softened by vanilla and brandy. Magnetic and intense, it’s perfect for a confident, unforgettable presence.

  • 1 x 3ml Forbidden Jasmine AM - A crisp, luminous floral with bright jasmine and creamy sandalwood. Effortlessly elegant, refined, and perfect for those who love timeless, understated beauty.

  • 1 x 3ml Forbidden Jasmine PM - A warm, creamy jasmine with roasted chestnut, cashmere, and sandalwood, accented by vanilla and cherry blossom. Cozy yet sensual, perfect for intimate evenings or quiet nights in.

s:variant.title: Default Title

entry.title: Amber Elixir
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty
Type: Perfume
Price: 2299.00

AM Story:  

Accords - Amber, Aromatic, Sweet, Woody  

Amber AM is a sophisticated fragrance for the woman who commands attention without speaking. It blends sweet amber and saffron with warm brown sugar and toffee, creating an elegant and sensual scent. Its heart of jasmine and cedarwood adds balance, while ambergris and fir resin deepen the warmth, leaving a luxurious trail of quiet strength and refinement. A fragrance for those who exude effortless elegance. 

AM Notes

TOP: Saffron, Jasmine  

MID: Amber, Brown Sugar, Ambergris   

BASE: Toffee, Oakmoss, Ambroxan, Cedar   

  

PM Story:  

Accords - Amber, Vanilla, Leather, Spicy  

Amber PM is for the fearless, rebellious woman who owns the room. A bold blend of spicy pink pepper, saffron, and smoky leather creates a powerful, seductive scent. Sweet caramel, bourbon vanilla, and amber add warmth, while the leather adds a raw, rebellious edge. This fragrance leaves a captivating trail, perfect for the woman who demands attention and isn’t afraid to break the rules.  

PM  Notes

TOP: Caramel, Saffron, Pink Pepper  

MID: Leather, Tonka Bean, Lily of Valley  

BASE: Bourbon Vanilla, Amber, Musk

s:variant.title: Default Title

entry.title: Café Noir
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty
Type: Perfume
Price: 2299.00

 AM Story:

Accords - Coffee, Aromatic, Sweet, Woody

Coffee AM is a serene, comforting fragrance that captures the essence of a quiet morning. With fresh, aromatic coffee, creamy milk, and a hint of cinnamon, it feels like a warm, indulgent moment. Subtle yet profound, this unisex scent is perfect for those who find peace in life’s simple pleasures and appreciate the calm of the everyday.

  

AM  Notes

TOP - Coffee, Orange Blossom, Red Apple   

MID: Cappuccino, Lavender, Tonka Bean  

BASE: Sandalwood, Vanilla, Vetiver, Milk Mousse 

  

PM Story:  

Accords - Warm Spicy, Coffee, Sweet, Woody, Vanilla  

Coffee PM is a bold, intense fragrance for the night. Rich roasted coffee, spicy cardamom, and chili pepper create a sharp, electrifying opening, while the smooth warmth of vanilla and brandy adds an irresistible depth. Unisex and magnetic, this scent exudes confidence and sensuality, perfect for those who want to make a lasting, unforgettable impression.   

  

PM Notes

TOP - Cardamom, Chilli Pepper  

MID: Salted caramel, Coffee, Cinammon  

BASE: Vanilla, Tobacco, Brandy, Cedar, Musk

s:variant.title: Default Title

entry.title: Forbidden Jasmine
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty
Type: Perfume
Price: 2299.00

AM Story: 

Accords - Citrus, White Floral, Fresh, Fruity, Woody  

Jasmine AM is a crisp, sparkling floral scent that captures the effortless elegance of a woman who radiates grace and simplicity. Bright jasmine smell opens the fragrance with a luminous freshness, softened by creamy sandalwood for a clean, refined balance. Perfect for those who love understated beauty and a timeless, second-skin feel. 

AM Notes

TOP: Yuzu, Limoncello, Kiwi  

MID: Lotus, Jasmine, Orange Blossom  

BASE: Cedar, Vanilla Leaves, White Patchouli, Sandalwood 

 

PM Story:  

Accords - White floral, Sweet, Warm spicy, Nutty  

Jasmine PM is a warm, creamy take on jasmine that feels like a comforting hug, blending lush floral notes with roasted chestnut cashmere and sandalwood. Accented with vanilla cream and a playful touch of cherry blossom, it’s cozy yet sensual—perfect for an intimate evening or a quiet night in.

PM Notes 

TOP - Jasmine sambac, Cherry blossom, Pink pepper  

MID: Chestnut, Marshmallow  

BASE: Sandalwood, Cashmere, Vanilla Cream

s:variant.title: Default Title

entry.title: Vanilla Whispers
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty
Type: Perfume
Price: 2299.00

AM Story: 

Accords - Vanilla, Aromatic, Sweet, Woody

Vanilla AM captures the grace of a modern muse with its sweet, creamy vanilla balanced by floral whispers of jasmine and lavender. Fresh top notes evoke the blush of morning light, while a warm, velevet-like base wraps you in effortless luxury. Feminine, refined, and timeless— this fragrance is for those who command attention with poise and leave a trail of sweet sophistication.

AM Notes

TOP - Lavender, Yuzu 
MIDDLE - Rosewood, Iris, Velvet, Jasmine Sambac
BASE - Vanilla, Sandalwood, Tonka Bean, Licorice Candy, Benzoin, Musk 

 

PM Story: 

Accords - Vanilla, Gourmand, Woody, Amber 

Vanilla PM takes you from day to night with its warm, sugary sweetness and bold sophistication. Opening creamy caramel, it deepens into rich amber and sandalwood, enhanced by exotic florals and musk. Sensual, daring, and unforgettable, this gourmand fragrance is both sweet and mysterious—a perfect blend of indulgence and allure for glamorous evenings or romantic nights. For the confident woman who leaves a bold, lasting impression. 

 PM Notes

TOP - Vanilla Orchid, Jasmine 
MIDDLE - Caramel, Vanilla Frosting, Tonka Bean 
BASE – Amberwood, Musk, Patchouli

s:variant.title: Default Title

entry.title: APPLE MARTINI POUT POLISH LIP TREATMENT BALM
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty
Type: Lip Balm
Price: 699.00

Introducing the Apple Martini Pout Polish Peptide Lip Treatment Balm – your newest obsession and the ultimate fusion of skincare and makeup. This innovative balm combines the hydration of a lip mask, the shine of a lip glaze, and the power of advanced skincare — all packed into one sleek tube.

Scented like a refreshing apple martini, this variant adds a playful twist to your routine. The balm starts off as a vibrant green but transforms into a unique pink tint upon contact with your lips, thanks to its pH-reactive formula. The result? A flattering, custom pink hue that stays put all day long — no touch-ups needed.

Formulated in Italy, it features highly targeted lip peptides that help reduce fine lines and wrinkles over time, while collagen boosts fullness and lip rejuvenation. Enriched with brightening ingredients, it’s also ideal for restoring natural lip color and treating darkened lips.

Our moisture-lock technology creates a protective barrier that keeps lips deeply hydrated for up to 8 hours, while the metal-tip applicator delivers a cooling experience with every swipe. Lightweight, non-sticky, and pocket-sized, it’s perfect for that juicy, high-shine glazed lip look — anytime, anywhere.

What makes this lip balm so good?

  • pH-Activated Color Change: Goes on green, turns into your perfect pink tint that lasts all day
  • Metal Tip Applicator: Gives a refreshing, cooling experience with every swipe
  • Triple Action Formula: Hydrates like a mask, shines like a glaze, nourishes like a treatment balm
  • Science-Backed Ingredients: Peptides and collagen hydrate, reduce fine lines, brighten dark lips, and adds plumping effect
  • Non - Sticky High Shine: Leaves a juicy, radiant finish without any stickiness
  • Comfortable, Lightweight Formula: Cushions lips in smooth, bouncy moisture that wears comfortable all day

  • Dessert-Inspired Scent: Smells just like a crisp, zesty apple martini for a truely indulgent experience

100% Vegan & Cruelty-free Net Weight: 8 gm

s:variant.title: Default Title

entry.title: Lip Treatment Balm + Cocoa Peptide Lipstick
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty
Type: Cocoa Peptide
Price: 1099.00

Say hello to your new lip ritual with our Pout Polish Peptide Lip Treatment Balm — the ultimate 3-in-1 that hydrates like a mask, shines like a glaze, and treats like a balm. Powered by science-backed peptides and collagen, it visibly smooths fine lines, brightens dark lips, and delivers a plumped-up glow. Its lightweight, non-sticky texture is perfect for daily use, while the cooling metal-tip applicator adds a refreshing touch. Packed with dessert-inspired scents and 8-hour moisture-lock technology, this balm is your go-to for soft, glossy, and nourished lips all day long.

Pair it with our Cocoa Peptide Velvet Lipstick — a modern matte made for those who want bold color without compromise. Infused with our hero ingredient Cocoa Peptides, this lipstick hydrates, smooths, and repairs while delivering rich pigment in a soft-blur, featherlight formula. Designed around universally flattering Pink, Mauve, and Brown tones for every Indian skin tone, it glides on effortlessly and wears comfortably for up to 6 hours. With a chocolatey scent and plush finish, it’s matte lipstick — redefined.

entry.title: Concealer + Ph Blush
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty
Type: Concealer
Price: 1599.00

Late nights, flawless mornings – meet the Hangover Proof Full Coverage Concealer.

This light-as-air, full-coverage concealer hides dark circles, blemishes, redness, and signs of last night – no creasing, no caking.

Why it's a game-changer:

Full coverage with a natural matte finish

Sweat-proof, water-resistant & crease-proof

Shea Butter-infused for hydration & smooth application

Blurs fine lines, pores & wrinkles effortlessly

XL pillowy doe-foot for easy, precise use

Doubles as a highlighter & contour stick

9 versatile shades made for Indian skin tones

Made in Korea


Say hello to glow – Typsy Beauty’s pH-antastic Colour Adjusting Blush!

India’s first-ever powder tint blush that adapts to your unique pH and moisture levels for a personalized pop of color that lasts up to 8 hours.

Why it’s a must-have:

pH-Adaptive Formula: Custom blush shade tailored to your skin

Powder Tint Tech: Long-wear, vibrant color with a radiant finish

Featherlight Texture: Breathable, zero-powder feel

Easy to Blend: Seamless, natural glow without harsh lines

Brightening Pigments: Instantly freshens your complexion

Oil Control + Hydration: Matte finish with skin-loving comfort

Universal. Weightless. Glow-boosting. Your cheeks, but better.

Liquid matte with one-swipe pigment

Blurs lines with a soft-focus finish

Packed with Raspberry Stem Cells, Cocoa Butter & Hyaluronic Acid

Non-drying, velvety formula that stays comfy

Mini, mess-free & made for on-the-go

Mask-proof, kiss-proof, food-proof

Big color. Tiny tube. All the impact.

entry.title: Glossified Lip Plumper + Mini Lipstick
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty
Type: Glossified
Price: 999.00

Juicy, glassy, plumped lips are just a swipe away with the Glossified Lip Plumper. Its melting fondue texture drenches lips in shine and hydration while delivering gentle fullness without irritation. A beauty essential straight from Korea, it’s skincare and shine in one.

Paired with our Happy Hour Mini Lipsticks, you’re ready for any event. These travel-sized, matte-finish lipsticks glide on with rich color in one stroke and never flake or bleed. Designed for comfort and convenience, they’re perfect for touch-ups and gifting.

entry.title: Glossified Lip Plumper + Lip Treatment Balm
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty
Type: Makeup Combo
Price: 1299.00

Get the best of both worlds: gloss and care. The Glossified Lip Plumper brings mirror-like shine, intense hydration, and plumping effects without sting, thanks to its unique melting fondue formula. Gentle plumping agents give you fuller lips instantly and improve lip texture over time.

Complement it with the Pout Polish Lip Treatment Balm – an all-in-one solution for hydration, anti-aging, and radiance. Peptides and collagen work to rejuvenate and brighten lips while delivering a juicy glaze finish. Together, they’re a hydration-packed power duo.
